article_title: New Push to Stop Overuse of Antibiotics in Nursing Homes
article_text:
Rochester, N.Y.

A new front is emerging in the war on the overuse of antibiotics: the nursing home.

Health officials and health-care executives, concerned by a rise in dangerous drug-resistant infections, are turning more attention to nursing homes, where antibiotics are some of the most frequently prescribed medications. They have...
